Leopold:
Nice to meet you, traveler. I am Leopold, commander of the third platoon of the Black Lion mercenaries. Our troops are as dignified and courageous as any Knights on this continent. We, the Black Lion, were the ones who defended Giran Castle when the drakes flooded Dragon Valley last summer. And we were the ones to destroy the Abellan pirates during the attack on Heine, the Floating City.
Currently, we have been hired by the lord of Gludio to drive away the remaining troops of Gracia. We must not mistake them for frightened fugitive soldiers. We are dealing with the infamous Ol Mahum troops that are known for their cruelty and plundering.
